# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, burner inserters, and boilers have fuel before they can operate.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to operate.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to smelt.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
